intro: Shoot Down the Fictional Ads in a Vertical Bullet-Hell Shmup
description:
Story:
Frustrated by unskippable video ads, the protagonist jumps into a shmup to blast them away.
Clear every stage and reclaim a smooth, ad-free internet life!

Languages:
Audio: Japanese (fully voiced)
Subtitles & UI: Japanese, English, Traditional Chinese

Charming Bosses:
Each stage boss is a marketing rep from a fictional company.
They fire bullet hell barrages purely out of a desire to promote their products—they mean no harm.
Plus, they’ve got great looks and voices. 

Beginner-Friendly Shmup:
Thanks to the HP gauge system, taking a few hits won’t end your run.
If you’ve ever thought shmups were too tough, this is the perfect one to start with.

Ads Aren’t the Enemy:
Clear stages to unlock special skills—like regenerating Lives when you stop shooting.
In fact, not shooting down the ads might work in your favor.
Use the power of ads to your advantage!

Original Soundtrack:
Every stage and boss comes with its own custom-composed theme.
With ever-changing vibes, there’s never a dull moment.

All 7 Stages:
Main Game: 6 stages × 3 difficulty levels

Extra Stage: 1 stage × 6 variations (with unique dialogues and ending illustrations)

No In-Software Ads:
No real ads are included in this software.
You’ll never be forced to watch one while playing—promise!

Japanese Voice Cast:
Kyohei Natsume / Haruki Asada / Yuki Amezawa / Daisuke Hirakawa / Masahiro Yamanaka
